```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(patchwork)
```



```{r}
biomass <- data7 %>% 
    select(site, post, response, SE, lower.CL, upper.CL, .group) %>% 
  rename(
    biomass = response,
    biomass_se = SE,
    biomass_lower = lower.CL,
    biomass_upper = upper.CL,
    biomass_group = .group
  )
```


```{r}
yield <- yield7 %>% 
  select(site, post, emmean, SE, lower.CL, upper.CL, .group) %>% 
  rename(
    yield = emmean,
    yield_se = SE,
    yield_lower = lower.CL,
    yield_upper = upper.CL,
    yield_group = .group
  )
```


```{r}
biomass %>% 
  left_join(yield)
```
